title: lulu level 6 and 7
body: been playing lulu for a while now got to level 5 been trying to get level 6 and cant figure it out. i have 418,402 pts (Gardian) with her and have countless S with her got 3 in one day but still cant get level 6 wtf should be 7 by now. what do i need to do???? also why do i only get one chest playing lulu for the whole season but the rest of the champs get one every S they get WTF LOL. the hate on lulu is real. i love her shes the best sup if used right

replies.body:
In order to earn level 6 mastery tokens on Lulu, you'll have to earn an S-grade while playing her in a normal or ranked summoner's rift 5v5 match. You can only earn tokens in these game modes. Regarding your question about chests, you can only earn a *single chest* on each champion per season. The chests haven't reset just yet, but they'll reset for the new season.

Check out our [Champion Mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) and [Hextech Crafting Guides](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for more info on these systems. Let me know if you have any questions.

In a slightly different direction. Can we PLEASE get our mastery grades back in client. I would love to be able to see if i got an A+ or the likes. Just getting a little chat notification on S's is a little to little info for me.
